topic.title: Risc-v Emu Is Not Work For Me!
topic.body:
say to zerome :::
i try risc-v emu by bellard just make to compile but not work to me ::::
$ make
gcc -O2 -Wall -g -Werror -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -D_LARGEFILE_SOURCE -MMD -DCONFIG_VERSION=\"2017-01-12\" -DCONFIG_FS_NET -DMAX_XLEN=32 -c -o riscvemu32.o riscvemu.c
riscvemu.c: In function ‘bf_read_async’:
riscvemu.c:2405:17: error: ignoring return value of ‘fread’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Werror=unused-result]
fread(buf, 1, SECTOR_SIZE, bf->f);

             ^

riscvemu.c:2414:9: error: ignoring return value of ‘fread’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Werror=unused-result]
fread(buf, 1, n * SECTOR_SIZE, bf->f);

     ^

riscvemu.c: In function ‘tun_write_packet’:
riscvemu.c:2612:5: error: ignoring return value of ‘write’, declared with attribute warn_unused_result [-Werror=unused-result]
write(fd, buf, len);
^
cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
Makefile:67 : la recette pour la cible « riscvemu32.o » a échouée
make: * [riscvemu32.o] Erreur 1
$ :(
help is not normal?

PS :: I Try Sign Up To Reddit to speak that me i not success so i speak the problem here

example in 24 bit :::: 1:24:170219:185185%sick::gIwxnUZvU6dyOg+E:000001WP3F

i added this feature in zeroblog, use vanityhash for post a comment (the post in french but my comment in english) ::::: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LmS6y5tSmkexzCdBB3NRXpY5JZTY1fXtR/?Post:1:Comment+Post%C3%A9+Un+Commentaire

No, but i make the music self i hope is liked it :::: http://127.0.0.1:43110/141EYXTVYTNRmLJA5cmQhrf9NreazoLi62/
